item.description: Meet at or carpool to Marcia's for a potluck supper. She will be supplying hamburgers and hot dogs. Please bring a side dish, something to drink, paper products, dessert....The address is 34 Crescent Road, Hamilton MA. You can call Marcia at 978-239-3392 or me at 603-432-4271 or 603-505-6172. Email the group if you want to carpool.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Potluck Barbecue Supper
